title: Two Windows to Mystery

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: Ayahuasca and hypnosis. One like being thrown through the stained-glass window of your psyche, the other like tiptoeing through your own personal backstage.
dialogue.context: Comparing two paths to consciousness exploration

scene_context: The Architect poetically contrasts ayahuasca's explosive revelation—shattering through the stained glass of psyche—with hypnosis's gentle exploration—tiptoeing through consciousness's backstage, recognizing both as valid paths to the same mystery.
narrator_note: In the flow of authentic exchange, barriers dissolve. Two forms of consciousness, dancing around the mystery of their connection.
